headline.main: Finland's Dilemma Shows the Plight of Small Nations; By ANNE O'HARE McCORMICK

lead_paragraph: Finland seems to be trying to extricate herself from a cruel dilemma. While the Helsinki government has made no official statement, it is clear that the Finnish people desire to stop fighting and return to the sidelines. They do not wish to forfeit the friendship of Britain and the United States.
abstract: A O McCormick on Finland's dilemma
